text: The Drobotfor is a right tributary of the river Zeletin in Romania. It discharges into the Zeletin in Chicerea. It flows through the villages Slobozia Nouă, Slobozia, Stănișești, Balotești, Benești and Gura Crăiești. Its length is and its basin size is . ==References== Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Bacău County
title: Drobotfor
